definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: :Ex 15:6 (Pr 27:16 no exc., v. Now Str) right hand (NH id.; SI:3 [[מימן]] on the right; Aram. [[יַמִּינׇא]], yamiyno0; Ar. yamiynun right, right side, right hand, south; Eth. yak4n: right hand, ymn: right side, Sab. [[ימן]] right hand, [[ימנת]] soth, are also quoted; As. imnu, right, right side, on the right, Dl:HWB 307)—abs. [[יׇמִין]] Ge 13:9 + 40 t.; cstr. [[יְמִין]] 1Sa 23:24 + 19 t.; sf. [[יְמִינִי]] Je 22:24 + 6 t., etc.; always sg.:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit. of man, oft. opp. [[שׂמאׁול]] Ge 48:13, Ge 48:14 (cf. v:Ge 48:18), Da 12:7; [[יׇדַע בֵּין־יְמִינוֹ לִשְׂמאׁלוֹ]] Jon 4:11 distinguish between one's right hand and one's left; [[שׁלח ימים]] Ju Jdg 5:26 (‖[[יד]]); as holding the lot Ez Eze 21:27; also of right hand as skilful Ps 137:5; as receiving bribes Ps 26:10 (‖[[יׇדַיִן]]); used in false swearing [[יְמִינׇם וְמִין]] [[שֶׁקֶר]] Ps 144:8, Ps 144:11 their right hand is a right hand of falsehood; oft also c. [[יַד]], [[יַד־יִמִינוֹ]] Ge 48:17 (E) hand of his right = his right hand Ju Jdg 7:20, 2Sa 20:9; [[אִטֵּר יַד־יְמִינוֹ]] Ju Jdg 3:15, Jdg 20:16 bound as to one's right hand, i.e. left-handed.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig., of right hand as held by ´[[י]] Is 41:13, Is 45:1; so [[יַד־ימיני]] Ps 73:23.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: right hand of ´[[י]], as instr. of delivering Israel Ex 15:6, Ex 15:6, Ex 15:12 +, cf. [[בִּגְכוּרוֹת יֵשַׁע יְמִינוֹ]] Ps 20:7; [[שְׁנוֹת]] [[יְמִין עֶלְיוֹן]] Ps 77:11; ‖[[זְרוֹעַ]] Ps 98:1; as acquiring the temple-site Ps 78:54; as holding his servant Ps 18:36 (line om. in ‖ 2Sa 22:36), cf. Ps 63:9 & [[בִּימִין חִדְקִי]] Is 41:10; as finding, lighting upon ([[מחא]]) his enemies Ps 21:9 (‖[[יד]]); as full of [[חֶדֶק]] Ps 48:11; as dispensing blessings Ps 16:11 [[נעימות בימינך]] (cf. Pr 3:16 of wisdom, personified); used in divine oath Is Is 62:8 (‖[[זְרוֹעַ]]).
of situation on, or direction toward, the right:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of situation, c. [[מִן]], [[מִימִינׇם וּמְשְּׂמאׁלָם]] Ex 14:22, Ex 14:29 a wall on their right hand and on their left hand; similarly 2Sa 16:6, 1Ki 7:39, 1Ki 7:49 = 2Ch 3:17 2Ch 4:6, 1Ki 22:19 (= 2Ch 18:18 c. [[על]]), 2Ch 4:7; 2Ch 4:8, Ps 91:7 (‖[[מִצִּדְְּ]]); for protection Ps 16:8; [[מימין ל]] 2Ki 23:13, Ez Eze 10:3; c. [[לְ]], [[וַתֵּשֶׁב לִימִינוֹ]] 1Ki 2:19, so Ps 110:1, Ps 45:10, Ps 109:31; c. [[עַל־]] Zec 3:1, 1Ch 6:24, 2Ch 18:18 (= 1Ki 22:19 c. [[מן]]), Ne 8:4, Job 30:12, Ps 109:6 cf. Ps 110:5; without prep. [[יְמִין הָעִיר]] 2Sa 24:5, Job 23:9.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of direction toward, lit. [[נׇטָה ימין]] Nu 20:17, Nu 22:26 (both JE); [[סוּר ימין]] De 2:27, 1Sa 6:12; ´[[פָּרַץ ימין ושׂ]] Is 54:3; also (vb. [[הִפָּרֶד]] in prev. cl.) Ge 13:9; [[הַבֵּיט ימין]] Ps 142:5; and looking is implied also in Ez Eze 1:10 (c. [[אֶל־]]; opp. [[מֵהַשְּׂמאׁול]]); c. [[עַל]], [[על הַיׇּמִין]] ([[לָלֶכֶת]])[[נטה ]] 2Sa 2:19, 2Sa 2:21; [[פנה על־ימין]] Ge 24:49; sq. [[אֶל]], of course ([[הלך]]) of boundary Jos 17:1; c. [[לְ]], [[לַיׇמִין מֵעַל לַחוֹמָה]] Ne 12:31 (vb. om., went) to the right above the wall; fig. of moral deviation, [[ימִין]]…[[סוּר מִן־הַדָּבָר]] [[וּשְׂמאׁול]] De 17:11, so De 5:29, De 17:20, De 28:14, Jos 1:7, Jos 23:6, 2Ki 22:2 = 2Ch 34:2; ´[[נטה ימין ושׂ]] Pr 4:27; also (very late) of the right as morally good, [[לֵב חָכָן לִימִינוֹ]] (opp. [[שׂמאל]]) Ec 10:2 De Reuss Now. †

of other parts of the body, besides hand (v. [[יַד־ימינו]] etc. supr.): right thigh [[יֶרֶךְ יְמִינוֹ]] Ju Jdg 3:16, Jdg 3:24; eye [[עֵין יׇמִין]] 1Sa 11:2; [[עין ימינו]] Zec 11:17, Zec 11:17; esp. [[שׁוֹק הַיׇּמִין]] i.e. the right (upper) leg of sacrificial animal Ex 29:22, Le 7:32, Le 7:33, Le 8:25, Le 8:26, Le 9:21, Nu 18:18. †

= south, because when facing east the right hand is toward the south: [[מִימִין הַיְשִׁימוֹן]] 1Sa 23:19; [[אֶל־יְמִין]] v:1Sa 23:24; [[ישׁב]] [[מִימִינֵךְ]] Ez Eze 16:46 (‖[[על־שׂמאוֹלך]]); [[חָפוֹן וְיׇמִין]] Ps 89:13; perh. also Ps 107:3, v. [[יׇם]]
